Title: Family, Friends, and Fools
Text: The first Feature you place should cost 4 or more.
RU Text: Первая Фича, которую вы положите, должна стоить 4 или больше.
Funny text: They believed in you because you struck them with you vision.

Title: Legacy Pet Project
Text: Your Product starts with a random Feature. Put twice as many Tickets on it.
RU Text: Ваш Продукт стартует со случайной Фичей. Положите на неё в два раза больше Задач.
Funny text: Let's not even start with all that cobweb...
